name: Noisy Space (Tej, lin25, ey758)
description:
Prototype for PCG in games.

W, A, S, D to move

Left click to Zoom Out and Right Click to Zoom In

Uses a Blue Noise Randomizer Algorithm to generate positions for the asteroids and a Godot default randomizer to generate the sprites for asteroids and the initial scale.

Team : Emily Yu;   Lisa Ye;    Tejas Sateesh
